Privacy Policy

This page informs you of our policies regarding the collection, use and disclosure of personal information we receive from users of our app (Sumokoin Android Wallet).

By using the app, you agree to the collection and use of information in accordance with this policy.

Data Collected

Personal data is any kind of data that could identify an individual.

Monero keys and public addresses are collected and processed by the app locally for the purpose of processing transactions and transmitted into the Sumokoin Network in encrypted form.

Other personal data is not collected by the app.

App Permissions

  • INTERNET : Connect to the Sumokoin Network via a Sumokoin Daemon Node
  • READ_EXTERNAL_STORAGE : Read wallet files stored on the device
  • WRITE_EXTERNAL_STORAGE : Write wallet files stored on the device
  • WAKE_LOCK : Keep device awake while syncing
  • CAMERA : Scan QR Codes for receiving Sumokoin

Changes to this Privacy Policy

We may update this privacy policy from time to time. You are advised to review this privacy policy periodically for any changes.

This Privacy Policy was last updated: 21th January, 2020.

Contact Us

If you have any questions about our privacy policy, or how your data is being collected and processed, please e-mail support@sumokoin.org
